'''Moonlight Seeker''' is an [[Event]] part of the [[Moonlight Merriment]] Event in [[Version 2.1]].

==Event Details [[File:Icon Moonchase Charms.svg|frameless|29x29px]]==
{{Description|During the Moonchase Festival, the Adventurers' Guild will place Moonchase Charms and Mystmoon Chests across the land. Collect these precious items and obtain the rewards prepared by the Guild. Linyang, the person in charge of this event, is very familiar with the positions of these mysterious objects. Stumped adventurers can ask for her help each day in identifying some key hints as to where they might be found.|Events Overview description}}
===Requirements===
* Complete [[Moonlight Merriment: Part I]] and [[The Many Matters of the Moonchase Festival]]

===Summary===
* During the event, when any of the gameplay stages Path of Stalwart Stone/Path of Gentle Breezes/Path of Austere Frost is available, exploration for the corresponding area in "Moonlight Seeker" will be unlocked simultaneously.
* During the event, Travelers can collect [[Moonchase Charm]]s and [[Mystmoon Chest]]s in the designated area to advance the collection progress of the area. All Moonchase Charms and Mystmoon Chests must be found to reach 100% completion.
* When the collection progress of the designated area reaches a certain level, you can obtain rewards such as the event-exclusive claymore, [[Luxurious Sea-Lord]] as well as its refinement materials, Weapon Ascension Materials, [[Primogem]]s, and Festive Fever.
* During the event, Travelers can go to [[Linyang]] at [[Liyue Harbor]] every day to mark a portion of the uncollected Moonchase Charms and Mystmoon Chests. Linyang will only mark up to 15 locations per region.
